original_text: Jacob finished telling his sons what they should do. Then he lay down on his bed again. He breathed for the last time and he died there. Jacob finished telling his sons what they should do. Then he lay down on his bed again. He breathed for the last time and he died there.
korean_text: 야곱이 아들에게 명하기를 마치고 그 발을 침상에 모으고 숨을 거두니 그의 백성에게로 돌아갔더라

sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 그의 아들들에게 말하는 것을 마쳤고

sentences.original_text: Then he lay down on his bed again
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 그는 다시 그의 침대에 누웠고

sentences.original_text: He breathed for the last time

sentences.original_text: Then he lay down on his bed again
